#summary Describes the Number class and its methods

=Number=
==Constructor==
{{{
Number(coord_x, coord_y)
}}}
where:
    _coord_x_ = x position of the box;

    _coord_y_ = y position of the box;

==Methods==
{{{
move(coord_x, coord_y)
}}}
moves the object in the patch to a new x, y.
where:
    _coord_x_ = x position of the box;

    _coord_y_ = y position of the box;

{{{
set(value)
}}}
sets the number to a specific value;
where:
    _value_ = new value of the number;

{{{
increment()
}}}
increments the value of the number;

{{{
decrement()
}}}
increments the value of the number;
